content: originally published by the american thread company star book no 107 *materials* - gem hat and bag yarn article 144 11 12 12 skeins medium blue or color desired or - dawn bulky yarn 11 12 12 skeins white or color desired - 8 inch zipper *measurements sizes 12 14 16 * - across front and back at underarm 18 19 20 - side seam 13 14 15 - sleeve seam 17 ½ 18 ½ 19 ½
